channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump pardons 1,500 Jan. 6 rioters, abandons Biden-era policies
item.description: President Donald J. Trump revoked dozens of Biden-era policies with new executive orders.

item.title: Oracle, Nvidia and other Big Tech stocks jump on Trumpâ€™s Stargate AI initiative
Dow gains over 500 points as stocks climb on first trading day of Trump's term
Biden pardons his family in final minutes in office
item.description: President Joe Biden previously had pardoned his son Hunter Biden, who had been convicted in a criminal gun case and pleaded guilty in a tax case.

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Tuesday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: Netflix crushes subscriber expectations while cheering its success in sports
Trump to announce AI infrastructure investment backed by Oracle, OpenAI and Softbank
item.description: President Donald Trump will announce a venture with OpenAI, Oracle and Softbank to invest billions of dollars in U.S. AI infrastructure, sources said.

item.title: Biden pardons Dr. Anthony Fauci, Gen. Milley, Jan. 6 committee members
item.description: The pardons by Biden came as incoming President Trump has repeatedly attacked Fauci, Milley and the Jan. 6 committee and called for prosecution of his...

item.title: U.S. dollar slumps as Trump 2.0 kicks off with no immediate tariffs
Trump rolls back effort to lower Medicare, Medicaid drug costs
